DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if breathing disorders are related to atrial fibrillation and if it is possible to predict recurrence of atrial fibrillation after DC-conversion by changes in heart rate variability and 24 hour ECG.
DOC.brief_title: Studies of Disorders and Mechanisms Related to Atrial Fibrillation Before and After DC-Conversion.
DOC.criteria: persistent atrial fibrillation scheduled for electrical cardioversion known obstructive sleep apnea
